DataElement.preferredName: Center for Epidemiologic Studies Depression Scale Poor Appetite Weekly Frequency Increase Scale
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A self-test that measures depressive feelings and behaviors within the general population - I did not feel like eating; my appetite was poor during the past week.
